overview: Brett Stubbs is a serial entrepreneur and social media developer. He’s founded and developed numerous websites, companies, and ideas. He launched Convinceme.net in 2007 that was covered on TechCrunch. He was also the sole developer and Chief Architect of Worldhistory.com, which was also covered by TechCrunch. He’s built a couple of android apps, launched new websites, and in the last couple of years has done extensive work on Facebook applications, social gaming, and all that sort of stuff. He’s either an entrepreneur who has become a top notch PHP developer, or is a really excellent PHP programmer who also has a passion for ideas. Either way, it’s been a good combination.
